name: express-promise-wrapper
description: Wrapper to use express with promises

scripts.build-coverage: npm run clean-coverage && node_modules/.bin/babel express-promise-wrapper.js >> coverage/express-promise-wrapper.js && node_modules/.bin/babel express-promise-wrapper.spec.js >> coverage/express-promise-wrapper.spec.js &&  node_modules/.bin/jscoverage coverage/express-promise-wrapper.js coverage/express-promise-wrapper.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build-coverage && node_modules/.bin/mocha -R html-cov coverage/express-promise-wrapper.spec.js >> coverage/index.html
scripts.coveralls: npm run build-coverage && node_modules/.bin/mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter coverage/express-promise-wrapper.spec.js | node_modules/.bin/coveralls
